item.title: Improve Cash Flow with MobileTechnology
item.description: How can you improve your cash flow at the time you provide a product or service? One method is with mobile credit card readers! They offer less cumbersome technology, ease of use, speedy transfer of funds to your account, with low transaction fees and no monthly fees. We explore a couple options available and how one will even integrate with QuickBooks financial software which reduces errors in posting the transactions. This technology is being used by small business, big business, entrepreneurs on the go, political campaigns and even the Girl Scouts for their annual cookie sales! What would this mean for your business? We support entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help them find the money in their business. Our mission is to provide an effecive means for cash flow improvement to organizations throughout the United States. Through the unique services we provide, revenues are enhanced, and profits are expanded. Remember: Knowledge and Power around your Cash Flow are the Keys to YOUR Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. Take Action Today for Success in YOUR Future! If you would like more information about our topic today or to schedule a Cash Flow Consultation, go to www.CashFlowStrategist.com or www.TheVirtualBookkeepers.com. Have a great week!

item.description: We take a look today at some of the top concerns of small businesss owners and offer some tps to go beyond them. What are your top concerns in your business? Government regulations, customers or clients, sales, cash flow, lack of a job, competition were just some of the ones discussed recently. item.title: The 1099 Rush
item.description: This is the last weekend to process and mail those 1099s. We discuss some of the changes in the reporting requirements and the increased penalty for each 1099 you do not file. What is a 1099K and how will that affect you? If you paid by credit card, debit card or a service such as PayPal you will need to exclude those amounts from the 1099-Misc forms as they will be reported on the 1099K. We partner with entrepreneur by going beyond bookkeepers to provide cash flow strategy to help them find the money in their business. Our mission is to provide an effective means for cash flow improvement. Remember: Knowledge and Power around your Cash Flow are the Keys to your Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. Take Action Today for Success in your Future! If you would like more information about our topic today or to schedule a Cash Flow Consultation go to www.CashFlowStrategist.com or www.TheVirtualBookkeepers.com. Have a great week!

item.title: Why are You in Business?
item.description: While reviewing my clients progress last year and in talks and workshops I have attended recently, I have noticed a common thread - Why are you in Business? Who are you really serving? Is your Why the deep down reason and purpose that drives and motivates you to jump out of bed in the morning to be of service? Why is this soul searching so important to your business? We briefly talk about these questions and how this will serve your business, business plan and ultimately your financial plan. We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeepers to provide cash flow strategy to help them find the money in their business. Our mission is to provide an effective means for cash flow improvement to organizations throughout the United States. Through the unique services we provide, revenues are enhanced and profits are expanded. Remember: Knowledge and Power around YOUR Cash Flow are the Keys to YOUR Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. Take Action Today for Success in YOUR Future! If you would like more information about our topic today or to schedule a Cash Flow Consultation, go to www.CashFlowStrategist.com or www.TheVirtualBookkeepers.com. Have a great week!

item.title: How to Use Accounts Payable
item.description: What is Accounts Payable? Why should you post entries to Accounts Payable? What do you do with it at the end of the month? Why should you reconcile this account? Are there other liability accounts you should also reconcile? What happens if you don't? These are some of the questions we explore this week. We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help them find te money in their business. item.title: Employee or Independent Contractor?
item.description: As you are preparing for year-end financial activities, be sure you have classified employees and independent contractors appropriately. We discuss how to know the difference between them so if necessary, you are able to reclassify and pay appropriate tax liabilities if necessary prior closing the books on 2011. Be sure you have your W4 and W9's on file so W2's and 1099's will be issued in January as scheduled to avoid unnecessary penalties. Also, how do you handle owner payroll and owner draws? We take a brief look at this situation as well. We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help them find the money in their business. Our mission is to provide an effective means for cash flow improvement. Remember: Knowledge and Power around your Cash Flow are the Keys to your Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. Take Action Today for Success in YOUR Future! If you would like more information about our topic today or to schedule a Cash Flow Consultation go to www.CashFlowStrategist.com or www.TheVirtualBookkeepers.com. Have a great week!

item.title: Tax Tips and Cautions
item.description: As the year is coming to a close, there is still time to make strategic changes in your tax and financial planning. We talk about a few of the higher penalty items (not including interest) to help you become aware of them and not make those mistakes. We also touch on some of the allowable deductions you can take on your tax returns. Be sure to talk with your Financial Planner and Tax Professional before year end to take advantage of any strategies that are still available for your particular situation. We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help you find the money in your business. item.title: Time = Money Management
item.description: You have all heard that time is money. Are you balancing your time and your money? This would include work/business, home/family, spiritual and ME time. item.title: Tax Law Changes Will Affect You
item.description: Do you know how the changes in the tax laws this year, next year and the following year will affect you and your business? Many of the deductions and credits are going away and taxes are raising dramatically! Now is the time to schedule a meeting with your Tax Professional to understand how you can prepare now. Be sure to have your bookkeeping records up to date so you can discuss your financial reports with your Tax Professional any strategies that may be available to you now! item.description: This is a good time to check in with yourself about your business. Why are you in business? Why did you choose your entity type or decide to be an entrepreneur? Napoleon HIll wrote "Happiness is found in Doing not merely Possessing." While you are evaluating the progress in your company, take a deep look into why you are doing this work, who you are serving, how you are serving them, and if you are accomplishing your goals. item.title: End of Year Tax Planning
item.description: This is the perfect time to update your personal and company financial records and to sit down with your tax professional for a year-end strategy session. You will be in a better position to see if you can pay into a retirement plan, or buy that equipment you need for your business and do year-end tax planning. This will help you understand the tax position for your company and yourself now. If you are a partner or member of a company/corporation you need to plan for tax consequences of the level of profitability of the company. I urge you to be prepared. Get your records up to date NOW! Make the appointment with your tax professional. You will not stress if you are in the know and have a plan! We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help you find the money in your business. item.title: Investors in Your Business
item.description: When I am talking with business owners, one of the questions I hear frequently is "How do I get funding for my business?" We talk about what you need to have prepared in order to find and pitch to banks, investors, potential partners to infuse skills, talent and funding into your business. What are the give and take for each of you? Will you maintain the 51% women owned equity if that is part of your platform? What is the process to find investors for your company? How will they help you through this course of action? We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeepers to provide cash flow strategy to help you find the money in your business. Our mission is to provide an effective means for cash flow improvement. Remember: Knowledge and Power around your Cash Flow are the Keys to YOUR Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. item.title: Having a Crystal Clear Vision
item.description: As we end the third quarter of the year, this is a good time to stop and review what has happened in your life and your business. Review your goals and results to-date. Those that are on track have a crystal clear vision about what they want want to achieve in three to five years and have mapped out the steps by year, quarter, month and day to achieve those goals. They not only see their vision unfolding, but they can feel it, hear it, and taste it. If you are not on track this is a good time to see what can be adjusted to realign your business to achieve the success you sincerely desire. As a Cash Flow Business Coach we can help you to improve your cash flows to monetize your business thereby enhancing revenues and increasing profits. For more information contact us at www.CashFlowStrategist.com or www.TheVirtualBookkeepers.com.

item.title: Innovation and Reinvention
item.description: Now that you have had time to take stock in the progress of your personal and business goals, how are you doing? Are you on track? Are your customers responding in the same way? Regular review of your progress can give you clues to aspects that may need attention, innovation and or reinvention. Remember we are here to serve others. If you are not providing value to your clients they will go elsewhere to meet their needs. How can strategic changes in what your doing keep their attention and serve their needs? If your goal was weight loss at the beginning of the year, how is that going? What is working and what do you need to change? The same questions need to be asked and answered in your business. Having a coach may help you, as an outsider can look objectively at your progress and trends and offer discussions to help you innovate and reinvent yourself and/or your business. It is not about changing businesses, but making strategic changes in your business to maintain the attention of your clients and meet their changing needs and attitudes as well. We partner with entrepreneurs by going bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help you find the money in your business. Our mission is to provide an effective means for cash flow improvement. Through the unique services we provide, revenues are enhanced and profits are expanded. We provide you with pertinent information you need to make decisions in your financial life - whteher personal or business. How can we help you? Remember Knowledge and Power around your Cash Flow are the Keys to Your Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. Take Action Today for Success in YOUR Future! For mor information about our topic or to schedule a Cash Flow Consultation, go to www.CashFlowStrategist.com or www.TheVirtualBookkeepers.com. Have a great week!

item.title: Liabilities in Your Business
item.description: Today we talk about the other half of the accounting equation - Liabilities in your business. How does the timing of the entries in your accounting system affect the health of your business? This explains why cash flow and your bank balance are not equal. This is also the reason you can not rely on your bank balance to determine if you are still in business. We partner with entrepreneurs by going beyond bookkeeping to provide cash flow strategy to help them find the money in their business. item.description: As a business owner you know there is more information in your business journal - bookkeeping - than just your bank balance. Your financial reports tell a bigger story about your company's stability and ability to continue in your business. We discuss some of these reports and compare the non-profit reports as well. Do you really understand what your reports are telling you and prospective creditors if you are looking for funding? We also offer a suggestion about daily cash flows. item.description: You often hear that you should have clear written goals, written in such a way you can see and feel how it will be at a specific date in the future. Having something to achieve can be a good motivator. However, how do you know if you are achieving your goals? Are you on track? We offer some suggestions to measure your goals for success that may help to fuel your motivation. We go beyond the bookkeepers to help entrepreneurs find the money in their business. item.title: Creating a Reasonable Revenue Model
item.description: How do you know if your Revenue Model or financial plan (also known as a Proforma) is reasonable? If you are starting your business there are methods which can be utilized to determine if your planned income and expenses are in alignment with your industry. We will discuss one of the tools available to all of you besides calling mentors or competitors for data which them may not be willing to share. This tool can also be used to compare existing an business with industry trends. Remember: Knowledge and Power around your Cash Flow are the Keys to your Dreams of Success, Freedom and Peace of Mind. item.title: Opportunities In A Recession
item.description: Recession is a hard economic time - or is it. Many have been laid off from their jobs, companies closed, or if you are lucky, your hours and pay have been cut but your are still working. We talk about some of the thought processes or mind set needed to make money in a recession, or any other time, as well as how to find ways to make more money and determine how it will impact our financial lives. We partner with entrepreneurs to provide cash flow strategy to help them find the money in their business. Our mission is to provide an effective means for cash flow improvement for individuals and businesses. Through the services we provide, revenues are enhanced, and profits are expanded. item.title: W9? 1099? Organization
item.description:
Getting organized for tax time is critical to your business. Just as you have to send out W2's for your employees, you have to send out 1099's to your independent contractors by January 31st of each year. The only guarantee of who qualifies is if you have collected a W9 when you first paid them. We will talk about how this will help you at year-end. What other aspects of your organization will enhance your business and personal life? We will offer tips to help you organize during the year in preparation for month and year-end activities.
